description: This file contains service functions for an LMS backend, including user authentication, enrollment, payment processing via Stripe, PDF certificate generation, notifications, and quiz grading.

methods.name: init_stripe_from_config()
methods.description: Initializes Stripe API key from Flask app configuration.

methods.name: Optional[User] authenticate_user(email: str, password: str)
methods.description: Authenticates a user by email and password.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[User],Optional[str]] create_user(email: str, password: str, full_name: str, role_name: str = "student")
methods.description: Creates a new user with a specified role.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[Enrollment],Optional[str]] enroll_user_in_course(user_id: int, course_id: int)
methods.description: Enrolls a user in a course if not already enrolled.

methods.name: Tuple[Optional[str],Optional[str]] create_payment_intent(user_id: int, course_id: int, amount_cents: int, currency: str = "usd")
methods.description: Creates a Stripe PaymentIntent and records the payment.

methods.name: Optional[str] mark_payment_succeeded(payment_intent_id: str)
methods.description: Marks a payment as succeeded and auto-enrolls the user.

methods.name: bytes generate_certificate_pdf_bytes(student_name: str, course_title: str, issuer: str)
methods.description: Generates a PDF certificate and returns it as bytes.

methods.name: Notification record_notification(user_id: int, message: str)
methods.description: Creates and saves a notification for a user.

methods.name: int grade_quiz(quiz: Quiz, answers: dict[int, int])
methods.description: Grades a quiz based on provided answers and returns a percentage score.

ctags.name: create_payment_intent
ctags.pattern: /^def create_payment_intent(user_id: int, course_id: int, amount_cents: int, currency: str = "usd"/
ctags.signature: (user_id: int, course_id: int, amount_cents: int, currency: str = "usd")

ctags.name: create_user
ctags.pattern: /^def create_user(email: str, password: str, full_name: str, role_name: str = "student") -> Tuple[/
ctags.signature: (email: str, password: str, full_name: str, role_name: str = "student")

ctags.name: enroll_user_in_course
ctags.pattern: /^def enroll_user_in_course(user_id: int, course_id: int) -> Tuple[Optional[Enrollment], Optional[/

ctags.name: generate_certificate_pdf_bytes
ctags.pattern: /^def generate_certificate_pdf_bytes(student_name: str, course_title: str, issuer: str) -> bytes:$/

ctags.name: grade_quiz
ctags.pattern: /^def grade_quiz(quiz: Quiz, answers: dict[int, int]) -> int:$/
